tracks.text: A woman lies on a red couch. She props her head up and sings to us. She has chest length straight blond hair and dramatic bangs. She wears a black mini dress and black boots.
In another room, she sings to us. Behind her, a brown haired woman lies limply on a chaise sofa. She stares off distantly. The blond woman has bubblegum pink lips and pointed black eyeliner.
The brunette woman lies on the red couch, eyes closed, an arm hanging over the side. She wears a black bra, lacy transluscent tank top, and ruffled black skirt.
The brunette lies in the chaise sofa. The blonde woman holds her limp hands and paints her nails red.
In the bathroom, the blonde applies makeup to the brunette.
The blonde sings to us. The brunette stares off.
The blonde brushes a blond wing while the brunette sits limply in the bathroom
The blond sings to the brunette in the chaise

The blonde and brunette dance, moving their hips and hands back and forth. They do the same motions. A line of green is painted across their eyes. The blond wears a lacy, translucent long sleeve shirt. The burnette wears a black dress with ruffles
They hold up 2 fingers
They hold up 1 finger, then point to the ground. The blond side eyes the brunette
The brunette lies in a bed.
The blond sits in the bed and rubs the brunette's head
In the bathroom, the blond lifts the brunette up and adjusts her head
The blond paints black polish on the brunette
They dance together
In a restaurant, the brunette pours tea.
The brunette
The blond
Catherine walks down the hallway in black and white. She pulls on elbow-length gloves.
Allison talks on the phone, lying in bed
Allison mouths, No, I would never
Allison looks up as Catherine opens the door.
Allison sits up and holds out a hand as Catherine approaches
Catherine wraps her hands around Allison's throat.
The 2 dance, swaying left and right,
Catherine drags Allison's limp body down the hallway
In the bathroom, Catherine sits Allison up next to a bathtub
She brushes Allison's hair
2 fingers
1 finger up, then pointing, then thumb raised to resemble a gun
Allison sinks into the bath
Catherine scrubs her arm. Allison lies in a blond wig.
Catherine sings to us. Allison lies on the chaise.
Catherine applies eyeliner to Allison
She shakes a finger at Allison
She drops Allison's limp arm and watches it fall
On the chaise, Allison blinks and looks around
Allison stands, and walks. She wraps a white string around her hands. She pulls the cord over Catherine and pulls at her neck. Cut to black.
Catherine sits limp Allison up on the couch. She turns, and Allison falls over.
